Compatible with iOS 9, 10, 11 and 12

Aporeo is the rebuild of my tweak Wolfram.

Want your iPhone to charge faster? No problem if plug your iPhone with Aporeo installed into a power source it will automatically enable Low Power Mode any your iPhone will charge faster. As soon as you unplug your iPhone Low Power Mode will be disabled.

Configure options from Settings

Added support for arm64e (A12) devices Bug fixes -Fixed a bug where Aporeo would turn off Low Power Mode if enabled manually by the user
- Fixed a bug where Aporeo would not enable Low Power Mode at the custom percentage


-Fixed a bug, where Cephei was not installed as a dependency, which would cause an error in loading the PreferenceBundle


-Added iOS 12 compatibility
-Added a feature to enable Low Power Mode at a custom percentage
-Updated Preference Bundle
Fixed a bug where the iDevice stayed in Low Power Mode even if it was unplugged

Fix crashes when using non-confirmation resprings

Added an icon to the PreferenceBundle
Added the option to disable Low Power Mode as soon as the battery has reached 100%

Added option to stay in Low Power Mode even if the battery has reached 80%.
Bug fixes

Fixed a bug with the PreferenceBundle which won't let the tweak work.
